The Japanese Canadian War Memorial is located at Stanley Park in Vancouver, British Columbia.
File:Founding members of the Canadian Japanese Association at the Japanese Canadian War Memorial.jpeg|Founding members of the Canadian Japanese Association at the memorial, c. 1920
